name: PHASEGroup
desc: A container that shares audio parameters with a collection of sounds.

items.name: init(identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a group with a unique name.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A unique name for the group.

items.name: func register(engine: PHASEEngine)
items.desc: Adds the group to the engine's dictionary.

items.name: func unregisterFromEngine()
items.desc: Removes the group from the engine's dictionary.

items.name: var gain: Double
items.desc: Modifies the volume of the group's sounds.

items.name: func fadeGain(gain: Double, duration: Double, curveType: PHASECurveType)
items.desc: Adjusts the volume of the sounds in a group gradually.

items.name: func fadeRate(rate: Double, duration: Double, curveType: PHASECurveType)
items.desc: Adjusts the playback speed of the sounds in a group gradually.

items.name: var isMuted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app silences the group.

items.name: var isSoloed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app silences all groups other than this group.
